replies.msg:
尋日Choya任務，合興隆澄清係日本公司落廣告

改洗：https://www.facebook.com/choya.jp/

留言Template:
As a loyal customer of your brand, this is my sincere advice to your 🇭🇰 branch/distributor NOT to advertise on TVB (Television Broadcast Ltd), a pro-Beijing TV channel of 🇭🇰 that often reports biased or fake news in in favour of Chinese Communist Party (CCP) and 🇭🇰 Govt to mislead audiences. 🇭🇰ers are currently boycotting the brands and products appear on TVB advertisement, the majority of 🇭🇰ers have resentment and grudges against TVB, please consider to advertise on other media platforms or TV channels, otherwise we would choose the alternative brand that have been cancelled contract with TVB.
